h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (Final Encounter)
content: Even without clones, he can still fly up to charge his sword, and then charge you with a fast-diving slash attack that you can deflect head on to stop him in his tracks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (Final Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
Even without clones, he can still fly up to charge his sword, and then charge you with a fast-diving slash attack that you can deflect head on to stop him in his tracks.
